Subject: Group Domain Users doesnt show up in the Users under Device Control - Users
Description:
We want to apply user policies to the default AD group "Domain Users" . Unfortunately the Group doesnt show up when listing the useres under Device Control -> Users. The group isn´t listed in the "Group"-Coloumn.  The AD Sync ist working correcly, if we add a group to one of the folders and add users to it, the group is showing up after the sync. Linked devices are successfully unblocked.
How can i use the "Domain Users" Group.
Solution_Comment__c:
M	The customer tried to sync users from a primary group. (This is not possible in epp due to a limitation)
Recommended creating a new group (The customer already tried that but they do not want to add the users manually)
Recommended to add the devices to a custom class to allow it for all users.
